appearance.TITLE: Creation Screen
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Display a form contains all field to create new contact message. Submit form will post data to /contact/create. If create successfully, please alert created success. If not, please display error message.

descriptions.description: Create new contact record in database by data from request.

appearance.TITLE: View Screen
appearance.DESCRIPTION: This view file will have 'Delete' button. 'Delete' button to get delete at /contact/delete/:id with id will be its ID.

appearance.TITLE: List All Screen
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Data will be displayed as a list, each of element will have two buttons to view, and delete it. 'View' button will lead to get detail view of Post at /contact/detail/:id with id will be its ID. 'Delete' button will lead to get delete at /post/contact/:id with id will be its ID. Screen will have a search bar to search contact by its title.

descriptions.description: Get all existing contacts in database.

relationships.title: List All Screen -> Creation Screen
relationships.description: List of contacts contains buttons to create new contact.

relationships.title: List All Screen -> View Screen
relationships.description: List of contacts contains buttons to view existing contact.
